::Magmatron::

    The door shut behind Megatron. Magmatron pushed a few bu=
ttons and all the holograms disappeared. "Bargin for what?" (There were no =
holograms in the office.)

hl

  >    Was gonna get to him   ::Magma=
tron::       The door to his office slip
  >open. Megatron stood there. (If=
 that seems like a mode, look at the end)
  >"Please come in and sit down. =
I am sorry about the state of disarray this
  >place  is in. Too many thing=
s going on at once."   (About Megatron
  >standing there. Dachande led him =
to  the door and then left, you never
  >posted saying that Megs left, so o=
ne would  assume that he was still at
  >the door.)

  OOC: Dont worry, I d=
ont have any problem about you making him be somewhere
  speacial. And than=
ks for getting to him, I knew you would.

  BIC: Megatron walked over to a =
chair and sat down, ignoring Magmatrons
  comments. If things were in disar=
ay, it proved Magmatron as a worthless
  leader (not my opinion, not insult=
ing you, Megatrons just full of himself).
  "That is not my concern. I wish=
 to bargain" he said abruptly.
